short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize the background image and color of your discord client.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your discord look beautiful through Discord Themes!

Discord Themes allows you to
-Create custom discord themes
-Set a background image of your discord client
-Set a color scheme of your discord
-Create multiple themes / presets that you can use later

Note: Refresh Discord when first installing the extension for themes to come into effect.
